segments.text: Welcome to my birthday party , I am so happy you can come .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for inviting me . Here is the gift for you . Happy birthday , Francis ! Many more happy and healthy years for you !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , shall I open it now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , a remote car model and my favorite brand . I really like it . That is so nice of you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I was really struggling whether I should give you this nice little car . It was the last one they had and I really like it so much myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Typical you , always wanting to keep the best things for yourself . The more I appreciate the gift now .
segments.speaker: S1
